electricity_cost.description:
Total amount paid (in USD) for station electricity use during reporting period
(estimated if station is not individually metered)

maintenance_cost.description: Total amount paid (in USD) for maintenance costs during reporting period or year

network_costs.description:
Total amount paid (in USD) associated with network access,
including network service fees, communications costs,
transaction fees, etc.

oc_period_end.description: End date of operations costs reporting period

oc_period_start.description: Start date of operations costs reporting period

oc_year.description: Year of operating cost (if reported annually)

repair_cost.description: Total amount paid (in USD) for repair costs during reporting period of year

station_id.description:
Unique identifier for the station where specific port is located.
(For NEVI or other Part 680 project, station_id must be same as
the permanent station identifier provided to third parties pursuant
to CFR 23 ยง 680.116(c)(1)).

station_mr.description: Total maintanence and repair cost incurred (in USD) in reporting period or year
